item.description:
OK, MY LITTLE CHICKS...YOU ASKED FOR IT! HERE IT IS...

Troy has had a technical problem with the Saturday date and asked me to post for Friday, Nov. 26th again. So let's all meet at the Sidewalk Cafe on FRIDAY.

For those of you that came to my party and listened and danced to the R & B jazz stylings of Troy Brown and Friends or met us at the Sideawlk Cafe ...you're in for a treat! Troy is playing Thanksgiving Day weekend At the Sidewalk Cafe in Hartford, once again and we want to get a crowd together to dance up a storm again!

Come out and play with us and Troy...he is the BEST! I know EVERYONE just loved him at my party...so come find out what you missed if you were not able to attend. I promise you that you absolutely WILL NOT be able to sit thru his music!

Band starts between 8 and 8:30 pm. I will be there at reserved tables at 8 pm. Looking so forward to this...oh yeah!!!!!!

..
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: Troy Brown @ Sidewalk Cafe...
